EmailTemplate.description: Notify installer of credit approval. Direct installers to fill out the installer form.
EmailTemplate.name: RL - Installer_Information Needed to Complete Application
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} - Credit Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c},
The Solar Loan Application for {!Opportunity.Name} has been submitted and their credit has been approved. We now need you to give us some information about the Solar Installation so we can issue a loan contract for signature.
Please complete the installer update form to update his/her information. You will need to enter the information below in order to update the correct customer's record. Please keep in mind that the Referral Code is CASE SENSITIVE
Customer Name: {!Opportunity.Name}
Referral Code Used: {!Opportunity.Custom_ID__c}
Please do not forget to attach your agreement between {!Opportunity.Name} and {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c}.
You can access the update form at any time by scrolling to the bottom of our homepage at www.bluewaveresolar.com
Thank you,
BlueWave Customer Care
